sentences.en: A British Foreign Office minister has made a robust defence of the agreement.
sentences.cn: 一位英国外交大臣坚决维护这个协议。

sentences.en: a robust man of six feet four
sentences.cn: 一个身高六英尺四英寸的壮汉

sentences.en: Coralie cried, with a shrug of her robust shoulders.
sentences.cn: 柯拉丽耸了耸丰满的肩膀,大叫起来.

sentences.en: He has the keen eye and robust approach needed.
sentences.cn: 他具备了所需的敏锐的洞察力和坚定的行事态度。

sentences.en: He looked neither robust nor weak.
sentences.cn: 脸色发黄,不显着足壮,也并不透出瘦弱.

sentences.en: He replied in characteristically robust style.
sentences.cn: 像以往一样，他的回答铿锵有力。

sentences.en: I want something sequacious now and robust.
sentences.cn: 我现在想要前后一贯和健全的东西.

sentences.en: More women than men go to the doctor. Perhaps men are more robust or worry less?
sentences.cn: 看医生的女性多于男性。也许男性更强壮或者顾虑要少一些？

sentences.en: Morris Townsend listened to this robust logic in silence.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯·汤森德默默地听着这套充满生气的逻辑.

sentences.en: She was almost 90, but still very robust.
sentences.cn: 她将近90岁了，但身体仍然十分强健。

sentences.en: That chair's not very robust; don't sit on it.
sentences.cn: 那把椅子不太结实, 别坐它了.

sentences.en: The Neanderthals were very robust and quite different from us.
sentences.cn: 尼安德特时期的人非常强壮，和我们迥然不同。

sentences.en: The Secretary of State has made a robust defence of the agreement.
sentences.cn: 国务卿对这项协议进行了强有力的辩护。

sentences.en: Then Hewlett Janders stormed over , big , robust full of action and profanity.
sentences.cn: 体利特·詹德尔斯冲了进来, 还是精神抖擞, 满口亵渎神明.

sentences.en: To judge from his productivity, Mozart clearly enjoyed robust good health throughout his twenties.
sentences.cn: 从创作能力来看，莫扎特20至30岁时显然精力充沛，身体健康。

sentences.en: We've always specialised in making very robust, simply designed machinery.
sentences.cn: 我们一直专注于制造极为结实耐用而且设计简单的机器。

words.tran_cn: 要用体力地；粗鲁地；坚定地
[自] 鲁棒性；[计] 稳健性；健壮性

phrases.tran_cn: n. 稳健设计；坚稳设计
抗差估计，稳健估计；强估计

trans.tran_cn: 强健的，结实的，强劲的，坚定的
trans.tran_en: a robust person is strong and healthy
